attributes.action: Defer the closure of the Jubilee Centre in St Albans, hertfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Jubilee Centre in St Albans is an invaluble source of care and support for our elderly in St Albans.  I feel very strongly that every effort should be made to keep this life line open.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
